stepItems.title: Answer the questions below as best as you can so that we can complete the work exactly how you'd like. If you're unsure about any, simply write 'unsure' and we'll come up with suggestions for your approval.
stepItems.description: You can press the help icon for more help on each one.

stepItems.title: What main heading (H1) would you like on your homepage?
stepItems.help:
• Or you can specify some existing text on the page
  • Include keywords you want to target
  • Don't make it a long list of comma separated words
  • Write in a natural way
  • Make it a single sentence
  • Don't worry, this isn't permanent as we'll make it easy for you to change later

stepItems.title: Where do you want this main heading (H1) located, what size and colour should the text be?
stepItems.help: If you don't have a strong opinion just write 'make it look good

stepItems.title: What new subheading (H2) would you like on your homepage?
stepItems.help:
• Or you can specify some existing text on the page
  • Include keywords you want to target
  • Don't make it a long list of comma separated words
  • Write in a natural way
  • Make it a single sentence

stepItems.title: Where do you want this subheading (H2) located, what size and colour should the text be?
stepItems.help: If you don't have a strong opinion just write 'make it look good'

stepItems.title: What do you want your homepage META description to be?
stepItems.help:
• This is usually shown in Google results, so make it compelling
  • Include why the searcher should clickthrough to your shop
  • Good example: \"Quality, handcrafted wooden propeller blades, props and chucks made using traditional processes. In sustainable Cherry, Maple and other woods.\"
  • Limit it to two or three sentences
  • Don't worry, this isn't permanent as we'll make it easy for you to change later

stepItems.title: What do you want your homepage page title to be?
stepItems.help:
• Select something that's unique about your shop
  • Avoid including 'Welcome to' and your shop name
  • Good example: \"Buy handcrafted wooden propeller blades from sustainable Cherry wood\"
  • Don't worry, this isn't permanent as we'll make it easy for you to change later

stepItems.title: What do you want to include at the end of all page titles?
stepItems.help:
• Include your shop name
  • Keep it concise, including your most popular categories
  • Good example: \"Ohio Propellers Inc. for propeller blades, props and chucks\"
  • Don't worry, this isn't permanent as we'll make it easy for you to change later

stepItems.body:
{% assign split_name = recipient.name | split: ' ' %} Hi {{ split_name.first }} Thanks. We've received your {{ job.title }} job. On the job you have one of our expert fixers who will be doing the work, a project manager, and us here at Plug in SEO to make sure you're happy. We use the Blimpon project management app to efficiently manage your job and for messaging in the team. What happens now?
  • If you haven't already, grant our fixer access to your website admin
  • We target the work to be completely wrapped up 14 days from signup
  • For the fastest response to any questions log in to Blimpon, go to the job and send a message there
  • Once we're finished you'll receive details of everything we've done
Important note Making structural changes to your website during and after this job can interfere with or lose our work. Please check with your project manager before changing to a new theme, editing your site templates or adding/removing meta tagging apps. So that your job goes smoothly just send a message to your project manager at any time if you're in doubt. There's no need to pause your normal day-to-day activities like adding/editing pages/products/collections/blogs etc. All of this is fine and won't affect our work. We look forward to getting this job done for you. Best, Daniel Plug in SEO PS: did you know we're Shopify Experts? reply to this email if you need any other work done on your shop
